Title: File Upload
Description:
This is a silverlight 4 app, it used for upload files with progress bar.
You can download it and run it directly.
这是个silverlight 4.0 程序, 就一个上传功能,支持断点续传,多文件同时上传
HomeWiki:
New version has been updated to the Silverlight 5 and add a pause and resume uploading features.

新版本已更新至silverlight 5, 并添加了暂停与继续上传功能;

添加单个文件上传
